comments: Great professor! Would love to take him again. His class does what it should do, Improving your writing, reading, critical thinking and everything. Rizzo is a great guy, funny and helpful. He does everything to help you get an A in every assignment, what else does anyone need? If you show up and want to pass or get an A, Rizzo is for you.

comments: Professor Rizzo took his time with each student to make sure they understood the content, the downside, Professor Rizzo was very inconsistent and at times seemed to be disinterested with teaching the class. I did learn in his class, but if given the choice, would not choose him again as my professor.

comments: Professor Rizzo ,Excellent Prof. very good communicator . I never felt uncomfortable to ask questions . Looked forward to the class . Writing and format ability has improved 100% . Professor Rizzo has a way of inviting one in to the process of constructive understanding of the Ethos Pathos Logos and there applicable uses.

comments: I had Rizzo for a class that was between ENGL 095 and ENGL 151 it was ENGL 131, this was the first time he was teaching this class, he never really knew what to teach, one day he would come in and just read papers that we did to us, not helpful and very boring, than the other day we went over poems and Shakespeare, he was all over the place a lot.

stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Paul Rizzo was one of the best english Professors I have ever had. He Is helpful in every possible way, and gives very great feedback. His class is not hard at all if you complete everything that he asks of you. As long as you do your work, you will get an A. Paul really did give me a better understanding of writing, and his class was worth it.
